hero.title: Pukla Features
hero.subtitle: Discover a world of possibilities ‚Äì from seamless link management to interactive content ‚Äì all in one versatile platform.

feature-1.title: Customizable Design
feature-1.description: Create a unique bio link page that reflects your style. Customize with themes, colors, and page layouts to match your brand or personal taste.

feature-2.title: Social Media Integration
feature-2.description: Connect your Pukla page with all your social media platforms. One link to unify your online presence and enhance your reach.

feature-3.title: Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
feature-3.description: Boost your page's visibility with SEO-friendly features. Improve your search engine rankings and attract more organic traffic.

feature-4.title: Security and Privacy
feature-4.description: Your data security and privacy are our top priorities. Pukla uses advanced encryption and security protocols to keep your information safe.

feature-5.title: Support and Resources
feature-5.description: Have questions or need help? Our support team and resource library are available to assist you every step of the way.

feature-6.title: Mobile Responsiveness
feature-6.description: Your Pukla page looks great on any device. Enjoy a responsive design that ensures a seamless experience for your audience, no matter how they access your page.

feature-7.title: Real-time Analytics
feature-7.description: Track your success with real-time analytics. Understand your audience better with insights into page views, link clicks, and engagement metrics.

feature-8.title: QR Code Generation
feature-8.description: Generate QR codes for your Pukla page, making it easy for offline audiences to access your online content.

feature-9.title: E-commerce Integration
feature-9.description: Sell your products or services directly through your Pukla page with seamless integration with e-commerce platforms.

header.title: Frequently Asked Questions
header.subtitle: You have the questions, we have the answers

custom_pricing.title: Custom Pricing
custom_pricing.description: Choose the features you need and we will provide a custom quote for you
custom_pricing.click_on_modules_to_add_or_remove_them_f: Click on the modules to add or remove them from your solution
custom_pricing.see_how_your_selected_modules_affect_you: See how your selected modules affect your price

offices.title: Offices
offices.description: Oversee all aspects of company office locations, including employee and department assignments, rent contract management, cost tracking, and seamless integration with expense and purchasing systems for comprehensive facility oversight.

branches.title: Branches
branches.description: Control operations for distinct company branches. Handle staff and department allocation, lease agreements, financial outlays, link with procurement and expense records, and manage branch-specific inventory levels.

warehouses.title: Warehouses
warehouses.description: Direct warehouse operations efficiently. Assign personnel, oversee lease details and costs, integrate with purchasing and expense data, maintain accurate inventory counts, and connect warehouse activities directly to sales fulfillment and logistics coordination.

clients.title: Clients
clients.description: Utilize a comprehensive Customer Relationship Management (CRM) system to nurture client relationships, track interactions, generate and dispatch professional quotes and invoices, and streamline the entire client lifecycle.

vendors.title: Vendors
vendors.description: Implement a robust Vendor Relationship Management system. Organize vendor information, issue purchase orders, process vendor invoices efficiently, and maintain strong supplier partnerships.

invoices.title: Invoices
invoices.description: Streamline the entire invoicing process. Create, customize, and send professional invoices to clients, track payment statuses, link invoices to corresponding quotes, and manage accounts receivable effectively.

products.title: Products
products.description: Maintain a detailed catalog of company products or services. Easily incorporate items into sales quotes and invoices, track product inventory across different warehouses, and manage product details and pricing.

quotes.title: Quotes
quotes.description: Generate accurate and professional sales quotations for clients. Track quote status from creation to conversion, easily transform accepted quotes into invoices, and manage the sales pipeline efficiently.

expenses.title: Expenses
expenses.description: Gain complete control over company expenditures. Track and categorize all business expenses, linking them to specific purchases, operational costs like rent, employee compensation, and other financial outflows for detailed analysis.

purchases.title: Purchases
purchases.description: Oversee the entire procurement lifecycle. Create purchase orders, track supplier deliveries, manage vendor invoices related to purchases, and integrate purchasing data with inventory and expense management.

employees.title: Employees
employees.description: Centralize all employee information and HR processes. Maintain detailed employee records, manage contracts, track time off, oversee performance reviews, and handle payroll data within a unified system.

jobs.title: Jobs
jobs.description: Define and manage job roles and positions within the organization. Outline responsibilities, required skills, salary ranges, and reporting structures for each distinct job title.

departments.title: Departments
departments.description: Structure your organization by creating and managing distinct departments. Assign employees, allocate resources, define departmental goals, and track performance at the department level.

job_listings.title: Job Listings
job_listings.description: Create, publish, and manage job openings across various platforms. Track the status of listings, define application requirements, and attract potential candidates for open positions.

applicants.title: Applicants
applicants.description: Streamline the recruitment process by managing candidate applications. Track applicant progress through hiring stages, store resumes and documents, schedule interviews, and collaborate on hiring decisions.

servers.title: Servers
servers.description: Monitor and maintain the company's server infrastructure. Track server specifications, manage configurations, monitor performance and uptime, and schedule maintenance tasks for physical or virtual servers.

domains.title: Domains
domains.description: Keep track of all registered domain names owned by the company. Manage registration details, renewal dates, DNS settings, and associated services for each domain.

websites.title: Websites
websites.description: Oversee the company's online presence by managing website details. Track hosting information, content management systems, development status, analytics integration, and maintenance schedules for corporate websites.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce
ecommerce.description: Control all aspects of the company's online sales operations. Manage product listings, process orders, handle customer data, integrate payment gateways, and track sales performance for e-commerce platforms.

infrastructure.title: Infrastructure
infrastructure.description: Gain a holistic view of the company's core operational infrastructure, encompassing IT assets, physical facilities, network components, and essential systems required for business continuity.

business.title: Business
business.description: Oversee strategic business operations, including planning, performance monitoring, market analysis, and key decision-making processes to drive overall company growth and success.

finance.title: Finance
finance.description: Handle all financial aspects of the company, including accounting, budgeting, financial reporting, cash flow management, tax compliance, and investment tracking for sound fiscal health.

hr.title: Human Resources
hr.description: Direct the full spectrum of Human Resources functions, from recruitment and onboarding to employee relations, benefits administration, compliance, training, and talent management.

it.title: Technology
it.description: Supervise the company's technology landscape, including hardware, software, network administration, cybersecurity, technical support, and IT project management to ensure efficient and secure operations.

faq-1.question: What is Pukla?
faq-1.answer: Pukla is a link management tool that helps you connect your audience to all your online content through one simple link.

faq-2.question: How do I set up my Pukla page?
faq-2.answer: Sign up, add the links you want, customize your page to match your style, and you're ready to go!

faq-3.question: Is Pukla free to use?
faq-3.answer: Yes, Pukla offers a free plan for everyone, as well as a basic plan with additional features for advanced users.

faq-4.question: Can I customize the design of my Pukla page?
faq-4.answer: Yes! Pukla offers a variety of customization options to ensure your page reflects your personal style or brand.

faq-5.question: Can I upgrade or cancel my plan at any time?
faq-5.answer: Yes, you can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your plan at any time to suit your needs.

faq-contact.question: How can I contact support?
faq-contact.answer: You can contact us via <email>email</email>, <twitter>Twitter</twitter>, <whatsapp>WhatsApp</whatsapp>, or <phone>phone</phone>.

ReportPage.page-subtitle: Have you discovered an illegal or unethical issue in one of the Puklas? Please fill out the following form to report it.

additional-comments.label: Additional comments that help us identify the report

copyright-owner.label: Copyright Owner Name
copyright-owner.hint: If you are filling out this form as the copyright owner, your name will be in this field

relationship-copyright-owner.label: My relationship with the copyright owner
relationship-copyright-owner.hint: e.g., I am the copyright owner / I am an employee of the copyright owner / I am a legal advisor / I am an authorized agent
relationship-copyright-owner.required: Your relationship with the copyright owner is required

reporter-role-options.non_pukla_user: Visitor and not a Pukla platform user

submitted.title: Your report has been successfully submitted
submitted.subtitle: Thank you for helping us maintain a safe environment for all Pukla users. We will review your report and take necessary action if required.

report-ip.title: Report Intellectual Property Violations
report-ip.subtitle: Is there a Pukla violating your intellectual property rights or trademark? Please fill out the following form.

good-faith.label: I declare in good faith that the use of the copyrighted content I am reporting is not authorized by the copyright owner, their representative, or the law.

trademark-good-faith.label: I declare in good faith that the use of the trademark-protected content I am reporting is not authorized by the trademark owner, their representative, or the law.

trademark-authorized.label: I declare and swear under penalty of perjury that I am the trademark owner, or authorized to act on behalf of the owner of the exclusive copyright allegedly infringed.

trademark-no-lie.label: I am aware that knowingly submitting a false claim of trademark infringement may result in legal liability under the Digital Millennium Copyright Act.

authorized.label: I declare and swear under penalty of perjury that I am the copyright owner, or authorized to act on behalf of the owner of the exclusive copyright allegedly infringed.

correct-info.label: I certify that all information provided in this notice is accurate.

my-info-shared.label: I understand that my personal details, contact information, and the content of this report will be shared with the user I am reporting.

no-lie.label: I am aware that knowingly submitting a false claim of copyright infringement may result in legal liability under the Digital Millennium Copyright Act.

trademark-owner.label: Trademark Owner Name
trademark-owner.hint: If you are filling out this form as the trademark owner, your name will be in this field

relationship-trademark-owner.label: My relationship with the trademark owner
relationship-trademark-owner.hint: e.g., I am the trademark owner / I am an employee of the trademark owner / I am a legal advisor / I am an authorized agent
relationship-trademark-owner.required: Your relationship with the trademark owner is required

trademark-industry.label: Trademark Industry
trademark-industry.required: Trademark industry is required (e.g., Media, E-commerce, etc.)
